name: Basic Tetris
description:
Recreating Tetris just for fun.

Code can be found on Github. (probably easier to play if ran directly from a downloaded version)

Download zip.

Controls:

  • Left: A, left arrow key
  • Right: D, right arrow key
  • Speed up (down): S, down arrow key
  • Rotate Left: Q, Z
  • Rotate Right: E, X, up arrow key
  • Drop Piece: space, enter
  • Store Piece: W, C, shift
